diff_hunk:

-    tensor([ 3.,  4.,  5.], dtype=torch.float64, device='cuda:0')

+
+    # Create an empty tensor (of size (1,))

body: I see, I am adding to the docs with invariants when creating an empty sparse tensor, and also an example of empty sparse tensor with `dense_dim = 1`
